channel.title: Latest News on IIBMers
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on IIBMers

item.title: New blog post tutorial
item.description: How to create a new blog post:. Create a new markdown file or copy an existing one, modify the informateion table header and commit/push to main repository, page will be automatically build after a while.

item.title: Pretty-print dates
item.description: To write out an ISO 8601 timestamp in the current language, you can use the date_i18n shortcode: Writing {{% date_i18n "2020-10-20" %}} will result in October 20, 2020
